Title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
FullTitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince (2009)
Plot: In Harry Potter's (Daniel Radcliffe's) sixth year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft, he finds a book marked mysteriously, "This book is the property of the Half Blood Prince", which helps him excel at Potions class and teaches him a few dark and dangerous ones along the way. Meanwhile, Harry is taking private lessons with Dumbledore (Sir Michael Gambon) in order to find out about Voldemort's (Ralph Fiennes') past so they can find out what might be his only weakness.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 9 wins & 38 nominations.
Stars: Daniel Radcliffe, Emma Watson, Rupert Grint, Michael Gambon
Keywords: school of magic,hereditary gift of witchcraft,witchcraft,hourglass,lifting a female into the air
KeywordList: lifting a female into the air

Similars.Stars: Daniel Radcliffe, Emma Watson, Rupert Grint
